DOC.brief_summary: Project title : A randomized control trial whole soy diet place red/processed meat high fat dairy product metabolic feature postmenopausal woman Objectives : Metabolic syndrome ( MetS ) escalate public health problem especially postmenopausal woman . Traditional whole soy food rich unsaturated fat , high quality plant protein various bioactive phytochemical could benefit MetS . The aim study examine effect whole soy replacement diet feature MetS among postmenopausal woman . Hypothesis test : Whole soy diet place red processed meat high fat dairy product significantly improve metabolic feature . Design subject : This 12-month randomized , single-blind , control trial among 208 postmenopausal woman high risk MetS early MetS . Study instrument : After 4 week ' run-in , participant randomly allocate either two intervention group , whole soy replacement group control group , 6 month . Interventions : Subjects whole soy group require include 4 serving whole soy food ( contain 25g soy protein ) daily diet isocalorically replace red process meat high fat dairy product . Subjects control group remain usual diet . Main outcome measure : The outcome measure include index metabolic feature well 10-year risk ischemic cardiovascular disease . Data analysis : The change % change metabolic feature 6- 12-month compare among two group . Expected result : Whole soy diet substitution high saturate fat cholesterol rich animal product notably decrease risk MetS .
